title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 01/31/2024 INC#1228

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1228; 05:25PM; 4535 W Melbourne Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OnVbPW; #LosFeliz; *Addresses Confirmed*. 81 Firefighters took just 37 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fast-moving flames from an outside fire that extended from vegetation to engulf a detached garage, and a portion of a two-story residential duplex (addresses include 4535 Melbourne Avenue and 4550 Russell Avenue). No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC1 BC14 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E20 E220 E227 E235 E250 E27 E288 E35 E52 E56 E82 E95 EM5 HR3 RA27 RA35 RA835 SQ95 T20 T27 T35 T50 T88 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1228; 04:48PM; 4535 W Melbourne Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OnVbPW; #LosFeliz; *Address Tentative* PRELIM: Outside fire extended into a detached garage, as well as the attic of an adjacent one-story home.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC1 BC14 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E20 E220 E235 E250 E27 E288 E35 E52 E56 E82 E95 EM5 HR3 RA27 RA35 RA835 SQ95 T20 T35 T50 T88 UR88; CH9; 13, 14; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1205; 04:56PM; 2818 W Leeward Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/42lRCj4; #Westlake; 36 LAFD Firefighters took just 19 minutes to access, confine and extinguish flames in one second floor unit. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E11 E13 E211 E229 E6 EM1 EM5 RA13 RA211 RA811 RA813 SO1 SQ21 T11 T29; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1205; 04:37PM; 2818 W Leeward Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/42lRCj4; #Westlake; PRELIM: Three-story center hallways apartment building with fire in one 2nd floor unit.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E11 E13 E211 E229 E6 RA211 RA811 RA813 SQ21 T11 T29; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Fire; INC#0964; 02:03PM; 8940 N Reseda Bl; MAP: https://maps.app.goo.gl/r3ZuzX5XTSTjsKLL9; #Northridge; PRELIM: Scaffolding (only) toppled into power lines at four-story apartment building under construction. No injury. Though there is electrical arcing and small flames involving debris near the currently energized scaffolding, the now vacant (all workers safety self-evacuated) building is not involved with fire. LADWP en route (unknown ETA). #LATraffic: Full closure of Reseda Boulevard between Rayen Street and Nordhoff Street until LADWP crews have secured the power line, and rendered the site and vicinity safe for travel. Unknown ETO. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio. Bus Riders: Follow @MetroLAAlerts on Twitter/X ( https://twitter.com/MetroLAAlerts) for any service updates.; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC15 E103 E273 E287 E70 E73 RA70 RA73 T73 T87; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 01/29/2024 INC#1767

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1767; 10:40PM; 3333 W 2nd St; #Koreatown; Firefighters responded to a very large four-story apartment complex, which had three occupied floors over a parking level. Crews simultaneously developed hose lines to a top-floor fire unit, assisted occupants evacuate, and cut holes in the roof for vertical ventilation. Seventy-two firefighters extinguished the flames in 25 minutes. One patient went to the hospital in fair condition due to smoke inhalation. Due to smoke damage, an unknown number of residents will be displace. Red Cross is responding to assist. No firefighter injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E20 E203 E211 E220 E229 E235 E27 E35 E6 EM11 EM5 HR3 RA13 RA3 RA35 RA6 RA803 RA806 RA811 SO1 SQ21 T11 T20 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1767; 10:15PM; 3333 W 2nd St; #Koreatown; Four-story apartment complex with fire in one upper unit. Offensive mode.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E20 E203 E211 E220 E229 E235 E27 E35 E6 EM11 HR3 RA3 RA6 RA803 RA806 RA811 SQ21 T11 T20 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1307; 05:02PM; 15639 W La Mesa St; #Sylmar; Firefighters responded to a one-story single-family home with fire in a front room of the house. Firefighters concurrently (1) deployed hose lines to engage in an interior fire attack, and (2) ascended ladders to the roof to provide the structure with ventilation (allowing the heat and smoke a place to escape). Ultimately, it took 36 firefighters 16 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. Thankfully, there were no reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E18 E275 E298 E75 E91 E98 EM15 RA75 RA891 RA91 SO1 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1307; 04:46PM; 15639 W La Mesa St; #Sylmar; One-story single-family home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E18 E275 E298 E75 E91 E98 EM15 RA75 RA891 RA91 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#1086; 02:37PM; 7307 S Hoover St; #VermontKnolls; Four-vehicle collision (one of them was parked/unoccupied) resulting in 6 injured patients. No one was trapped. Three were transported in moderate condition, two were transported in fair condition, and one refused the offer for ambulance transport. LAPD Incident #3099. Nothing further.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AP65 BC13 E233 E33 EM13 EM4 RA14 RA246 RA57 RA814 RA833 RA846 RA857 RA864 T33; CH4; 12; Nicholas Prange
